DOC.brief_summary: This single-arm , open-label , multicenter , observational study evaluate efficacy safety Avastin ( bevacizumab ) patient glioblastoma multiforme first second relapse . Data collect eligible patient initiated Avastin treatment accord local label 3 year .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study Avastin ( Bevacizumab ) Patients With Glioblastoma Multiforme First Second Relapse
DOC.criteria: Adults patient , > /= 18 year age Histologically confirm glioblastoma multiforme first second relapse Patients qualify Avastin treatment per local label
